unnormalised: Arre yaar, dor mhoinyache electricity bill mhaka heart attack dita! Fattlim mhoinyar ₹3500 aslem, he mhoinyar adich ₹4200 zala ani aiz 15 tarikuch asa! Hea daranim, hanv mhaje kidney vikun bills bhortelim. Konnak zannam asa ki hanv thodi vaparloli kidney kitleak vikunk zata? Mitra khatir vicharta, obviously. Ani BSNL broadband? Techim mat korunakat... ₹899 ‘unlimited’ data khatir ji 50GB uprant throttle zata. Comedy show chalu asa kai?
normalised: Arre yaar, dor mhoinyache electricity bill maka heart attack haddta! Fattlyea mhoinyant tin hazar panchshe rupee asle, hea mhoinyant char hazar donshye zal'le ani ajun pandhra tarikuch asa! Hea darant, mhaka majhi kidney vikchi poddteli bill bhorpak. Konak tori khobor asa kite, thoddi vaparlea kidneyk boro bhav kitem mellttolo? Mitra khatir vichartam, dekhun sangtam. Ani B-S-N-L broadband? Tankam mhaka start korunakai... atthshe nannau rupee 'unlimited' data khatir ani to fifty gigabyte zalea uprant throttled zata. Comedy show chalu asa kite?
